name: Miss the past
description:
// ENGLISH

Miss the past is a simple and minimalist roguelike on a zombie world in the 80's

This game is on development status

In the future this proyect goint to have:

+Characthers
+More enemies
+History
+Bosses

+Music

// WORK IN PROGRESS 

+Characthers (21/9/20)

1 - Police (Police bat + Pistol)

2- Employer

3- Hacker

4- Homeless (Punch + Bottle of wine)

5- Ninja (Katana + Shuriken)

6- Soldier (Punch + Sub fusil)
